Author: designer#4893
Content:
Bitcoin surpassed $10,000.
It took two years and six months to get from $1,000 to $10,000.
It took more than three years to break the $100-$1,000 mark, but the $1,000-$10,000 mark was faster.
It is important to understand the characteristics of bitcoin prices that increase with log scale.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
instead of getting a purism laptop I'll suggest you to get an old Thinkpad laptop, any Thinkpad laptop, flash the secure BIOS on it, and then install your favourite linux.
and only use it for your cryptocurrency wallets, and nothing else. also compile all your cryptocurrency wallets yourself without downloading pre-compiled binaries.
it will all cost you from $200-$600 USD depending on what old Thinkpad laptop you get.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: much cheaper than purism.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
